Judul: Eks Menteri ESDM Ignasius Jonan Berlabuh ke Unilever
News:
Mantan Menteri ESDM periode 2016-2019 Ignasius Jonan dikabarkan akan menjadi Komisaris Independen di perusahaan konsumer multinasional PT Unilever Indonesia Tbk (UNVR).

Hal tersebut disampaikan dalam undangan konferensi pers Rapat Umum Pemegang Saham Tahunan (RUPST) Unilever Indonesia yang akan diselenggarakan bulan depan. Salah satu agenda yang akan dilaksanakan adalah mengangkat Jonan menjadi salah satu komisaris perusahaan.

Direktur Governance & Corporate Affairs sekaligus Sekretaris Perusahaan Unilever Sancoyo Antarikso membenarkan hal tersebut.

"Benar. Bapak Ignasius Jonan akan diusulkan untuk diangkat sebagai Komisaris Independen dalam RUPST tanggal 24 Juli mendatang," kata Sancoyo kepada CNBC Indonesia, Kamis (25/6/2020).Adapun Unilever Indonesia akan melaksanakan RUPST pada Jumat (24/7/2020) yang berlokasi di Grha Unilever, BSD City, Tangerang.

Terdapat empat agenda yang akan dilaksanakan dalam rapat tersebut, antara lain pengesahan laporan keuangan dan persetujuan laporan tahunan perusahaan untuk tahun buku 2019.

Kemudian, dalam rapat ini perusahaan akan menetapkan penggunaan laba bersih perusahaan untuk tahun buku 31 Desember 2019. Rapat ini juga akan meminta persetujuan penunjukan Kantor Akuntan Publik (KAP) untuk mengaudit laporan keuangan untuk tahun 2020.

Terakhir adalah pengangkatan anggota direksi dan komisaris perusahaan bersamaan dengan penetapan remunerasi tahun ini.

Judul: IP UNVR: 4Q19 results was DECENT, but project weaker sales growth. Maintain BUY
News:
Last night we published a result note on UNVR
. Result was largely in line. We cut our FY20/21F EPS by 1.8/3.3% due to ETS payment starting in 4Q19, translating to lower TP of Rp51,000. Maintain BUY on UNVR
.
Link to our report: A decent quarter
- UNVR
recorded a decent growth of 2.6% yoy and 6.8% yoy in revenue and core earnings growth respectively in 9M19. This is in line with both ours and consensus estimate.
- HPC sales growth slowed to 2.8% yoy in 3Q19 (vs. 8.2% yoy in 2Q19), understandable coming from a relatively high base growth in 3Q18. Although GPM improvement of 240bps yoy to 53.6% in 3Q19 compensated for the slowdown.
- On the other hand, F&R sales recorded a solid sales growth of 11.6% yoy, likely to imply the superior growth of two its largest sales contributor in the division: Bango and Walls, albeit competition. GPM, however, declined by 40bps yoy likely due to high coconut sugar and skim milk prices.
- Despite the decent 9M19 result, we cut our FY20/21F EPS forecast by 1.8/3.3%, as UNVR
is expected to make their first-round of ETS payment starting in 4Q19. We estimate this will add up to total royalty payment of 7.1%/7.6%/8.0% of third-party sales in FY19/FY20/FY21F. Please refer to figure 2 below for details.
- We maintain our Buy call on UNVR
, albeit a slight trim in TP to Rp51,000. This implies pegging our valuation to its 5-year mean of 48.6x 2020F P/E (from 50.7x), while maintaining our 2018-21F revenue CAGR of 5.9%.

Judul: Penjualan Uniliver Naik 4,8 Persen di Tahun 2019
News:

Judul: IP UNVR: 4Q19 results: margin expansion offset the weaker F&R sales
News:
Company Update  /  UNVR
IJ  /  Click here for full PDF version 
 Author(s):     Kevie Aditya  ;   Elbert Setiadharma 
Excluding impact from spread divestment, FY19 core net profit grew by 8.5% yoy to Rp7.4tr which is in-line with our/consensus estimates.
4Q19 sales growth of 2.8% yoy was weak, but was offset by 160bps yoy GPM improvement, likely due to falling oil price and strengthening IDR.
We think these shall allow UNVR
to maintain its margins in FY20F, despite a risk of potentially weaker purchasing power. Maintain Buy.

In-line profit with strongest-ever FY EBITDA margin
Excluding one-off gain from FY18 spreads divestment worth Rp2.1tr and its spread business' profit of Rp200bn, core net profit grew 8.5% yoy to Rp7.4tr which is in-line with our/consensus estimates. It recorded 2.7% yoy revenue growth in FY19 (4.8% yoy if excluding spreads divestment in 3Q18; much improved from 2.9% and 1.5% yoy revenue growth in FY17 and FY18). FY19 EBITDA margin at 25.6% was UNVR
's strongest since listed, partially thanks to a rebound of GPM to 51.3%. A&P expenses increased 30bps yoy to 5.8% of sales, but still lower than 5-year average of 6.5%.
Weak 4Q19 sales growth ...
UNVR
's 4Q19 sales growth of only 2.8% yoy was a disappointment vs. 3Q19 sales growth of 5.4% yoy. Weak sales was attributed to slower yoy growth in the F&R category (3.6% yoy in 4Q19 vs. 11.6% yoy in 3Q19), while HPC recorded a stable but slow 2.5% yoy growth.
... offset by solid 4Q19 GPM improvement
Nonetheless, 4Q19 GPM surged to 52.9% (vs. 3Q19: 50.3% and 4Q18: 51.3%) - highest in the past 5 years. This was mainly driven by the increase in HPC GPM to 56.8% (vs. 3Q19: 53.6% and 4Q18: 53.2%), which we believe was largely due to falling oil price and strengthening rupiah. F&R GPM improved qoq to 43.4%, although still dropped 340bps yoy.
Maintain Buy with lower TP Rp9,400
While UNVR
's innovation (total of 100 products launched and re-launched in FY19) looks promising, we remain cautious on the purchasing power outlook. We expect windfalls coming from strengthening rupiah and lower oil price; just enough to offset opex increase largely from new ETS payment. We cut our FY20-21F sales estimates by 4.4/5.0% and core EPS estimates by 3.3/4.4%. Nonetheless, we maintain our Buy call on UNVR
with lower TP of Rp9,400, as we rolled over our valuation to 44.5x 2021F P/E (previously 48.6x 2020F P/E), pegged to 1 s.d. below 5-year mean.

Kecenderungan bullish juga tercermin dari posisi harganya yang bergerak lebih tinggi dari nilai rata-rata harga sahamnya (moving average) dalam 5 hari terakhir (MA5) dan 20 hari terakhir (MA20).Secara momentum ruang kenaikannya masih terbuka karena pergerakan harga sahamnya yang belum memasuki wilayah jenuh belinya (overbought), mengacu pada indikator teknikal Relative Strength Index (RSI) yang dicitrakan garis berwarna hijau.

Ada potensi harganya akan menguji level resistance (tolakan di harga tinggi) di harga Rp 8.800/sahamnya dalam dua hingga tiga pekan mendatang. Sedangkan penahan harga turunnya (support) berada di Rp 8.400/saham yang merupakan nilai stock split terbarunya.

menganggarkan capex Rp1,1 triliun pada tahun ini.

meningkatkan kapasitas produksi untuk produk deodoran dan membeli  freezer display . Selain itu, belanja modal UNVR
juga untuk digunakan untuk memasarkan produk es krim baru, Seru.

akan terus memperkuat dan senantiasa melihat peluang untuk menambah produk baru

"Kami optimistis dengan adanya stock split, harga saham UNVR akan terjangkau oleh investor ritel kebanyakan," kata Sancoyo Antarikso, Direktur sekaligus Sekretaris Perusahaan Unilever, dalam paparannya dalam RUPSLB, hari ini."Dan harapannya [stock split UNVR] akan mampu mendukung pertumbuhan Bursa Efek Indnonesia karena adanya peningkatan likuiditas perdagangan saham UNVR," katanya.

Rizky sebelumnya adalah direktur operasional Danone Indonesia. Rizky memiliki pengalaman lebih dari 27 tahun di bidang supply chain (rantai pasok) baik itu di Indonesia dan sejumlah negara lain seperti Thailand, dan beberapa negara Timur Tengah, Eropa, dan juga China.
